    • pauseExecution

      public static void pauseExecution()

    • implementAddNewPrj

      public static void implementAddNewPrj(Statement statement)
      A function that adds a new project to the PROJECTS table in the database.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.

    • implementAddNewPerson

      public static void implementAddNewPerson(Statement statement)
      Add a new person to the database. The person gets added either to the CUSTOMERS, ARCHITECTS, or CONTRACTORS tables.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.

    • implementUpdateInfo

      public static void implementUpdateInfo(Statement statement)
      View the data relating to a specific project, after which the user specifies which field value he would like to change along with the new value itself.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.

    • implementUpdatePerson

      public static void implementUpdatePerson(Statement statement)
      This function operates on either the CUSTOMERS, ARCHITECTS, or CONTRACTORS tables in the database. First view all the data pertaining to a specific person, after which the user specifies which field needs to change, along with the new value itself.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.

    • implementDeleteProject

      public static void implementDeleteProject(Statement statement)
      Based on the selected project number, delete the associated project from the PROJECTS table.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.

    • implementDeleteProjectAndPeople

      public static void implementDeleteProjectAndPeople(Statement statement)
      Based on a selected project number, delete the associated project from the PROJECTS table. The corresponding architect name, contractor name, and customer name also gets deleted from the ARCHITECTS, CONTRACTORS, and CUSTOMERS tables. Therefore no trace of the project is left behind.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.

    • implementDeletePerson

      public static void implementDeletePerson(Statement statement)
      This method operates on either the ARCHITECTS, CONTRACTORS, or CUSTOMERS table. Based on the selected person, the associated row of data gets removed from the table.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.

    • implementFinaliseProject

      public static void implementFinaliseProject(Statement statement)
      Finalise a project that has an "ongoing" status. The status gets changed to "finalised", and a completion date gets added to the project in the PROJECTS table.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.

    • implementShowByPrjNo

      public static void implementShowByPrjNo(Statement statement)
      Select a certain project number, and then from that number display all the other information related to the specific project.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.

    • implementShowByPrjName

      public static void implementShowByPrjName(Statement statement)
      Select a certain project name, and then from that name display all the other information related to the specific project.
      Parameters:
      statement - A Direct Line to the database for running our queries.

    • implementExitProgram

      public static void implementExitProgram()
      Exit the main menu and terminate the program. To go back to the main menu, the user would need to run PoisePMS again.

    • implementInvalidInput

      public static void implementInvalidInput()
      The user entered something other than a number in the range of [0; 12]. The user gets taken back to the main menu.
